adInterfaceMCC.util

Class ADInterfaceMCC

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.kernel.util.NamedObj
      • ptolemy.kernel.InstantiableNamedObj
        • ptolemy.kernel.Entity
          • ptolemy.kernel.ComponentEntity
            • ptolemy.actor.AtomicActor
              • ptolemy.actor.TypedAtomicActor
                • adInterfaceMCC.util.ADInterfaceMCC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, ptolemy.actor.Actor, ptolemy.actor.Executable, ptolemy.actor.FiringsRecordable, ptolemy.actor.Initializable, ptolemy.actor.lib.SequenceActor, ptolemy.actor.TypedActor, ptolemy.kernel.util.Changeable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Debuggable, ptolemy.kernel.util.DebugListener, ptolemy.kernel.util.Derivable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Instantiable, ptolemy.kernel.util.ModelErrorHandler, ptolemy.kernel.util.MoMLExportable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Moveable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Nameable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ADInterfaceMCCReader, ADInterfaceMCCWriter

    public abstract class ADInterfaceMCC
extends ptolemy.actor.TypedAtomicActor
implements ptolemy.actor.lib.SequenceActor
    This is an abstract base class for actors that generates an output stream. It is used by ADInterfaceMCCReader and ADInterfaceMCCWriter
    Author:
    Thierry Nouidui based on Bacnet Implementation
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • ADInterfaceMCC

        public ADInterfaceMCC(ptolemy.kernel.CompositeEntity container,
                      java.lang.String name)
               throws ptolemy.kernel.util.NameDuplicationException,
                      ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Construct an actor with the given container and name.
        Parameters:
        container - The container.
        name - The name of this actor.
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - If the actor cannot be contained by the proposed container.
        ptolemy.kernel.util.NameDuplicationException - If the container already has an actor with this name.

        public java.lang.Object clone(ptolemy.kernel.util.Workspace workspace)
                       throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Clone the actor into the specified workspace. This calls the base class and then resets the type constraints.
        Overrides:
        clone in class ptolemy.actor.AtomicActor
        Parameters:
        workspace - The workspace for the new object.
        Returns:
        A new actor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - If a derived class contains an attribute that cannot be cloned.
        See Also:

      • setSchemaFileName

        protected abstract void setSchemaFileName()
        Abstract class that sets the schema file name. The class that implements this function needs to assign the variable schemaFileName.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Initialization section, initialize variables and check possible errors.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface ptolemy.actor.Initializable
        Overrides:
        initialize in class ptolemy.actor.AtomicActor
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - if configuration file couldn't be found or if schema file could not be found or if operation system is Mac OS X or Linux or if ADInterfaceMCC-stack library has not been compiled.

                         throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Check if configuration file exists. This function is called by initialize().
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - if file path is null or configuration file could not be found.

                              throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException

        public void checkSchemaFileExists()
                           throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Check if schema file exists. This function is called in initialize().
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - if schema file couldn't be found.

      • readXMLConfigurationFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<ADInterfaceMCCObjectType> readXMLConfigurationFile()
                                                                       throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Read the xml configuration file, store the elements to ADInterfaceMCCObjectType ArrayList. This function is called by initialize(). (see ADInterfaceMCCReader and ADInterfaceMCCWriter).
        Returns:
        ArrayList of ADInterfaceMCCObjectType.
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - if either SAXException or ParserConfiguration Exception has been caught.

      • storeDataInLastTimeStep

        public void storeDataInLastTimeStep()
        Store response from last time step. This function is called in prepareTokensToSend().

      • executeProcess

        public void executeProcess(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.ProcessBuilder> process_arr)
                    throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Execute Processes, store results to consoleoutput_arr and exitvalue-arr. This function is called in fire(), (see ADInterfaceMCCReader and ADInterfaceMCCWriter).
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - if error occurs and continueWhenError is false.

      • transformArrayListString

        public ptolemy.data.Token[] transformArrayListString(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> data_str)
        Transform String Arraylist to Token Arrays. This function is called in prepareTokensToSend().

      • transformArrayListDouble

        public ptolemy.data.Token[] transformArrayListDouble(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> data_str)

      • prepareTokensToSend

        public void prepareTokensToSend()
                         throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Get tokens to send for the next timestep. This function is called in fire(), (see ADInterfaceMCCReader and ADInterfaceMCCWriter).
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - if errors occur in executeProcess.

      • sendToken

        public void sendToken()
               throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Sends the error signal to the errorSignal port, the error message to the errorMessage port, and the console output to the consoleArr. This function is called by fire().
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException

      • validateAttributes

        public void validateAttributes()
                        throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Validate application tag. This function is called by initialize(). (See adInterfaceMCC and ADInterfaceMCCWriter and ADInterfaceMCCReader).
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - if the application tag is not part of the ADInterfaceMCC Devices.

      • validateSyntax

        public void validateSyntax()
                    throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Validate xml configuration file syntax. This function is called in initialze().
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - if configuration file couldn't be found or syntax is against the schema file.

      • removeToken

        public void removeToken()
                 throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
        Remove tokens in previous time step. This function is called by the fire() method of the ADInterfaceMCCReader and ADInterfaceMCCWriter.
        Throws:
        ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
